title: Selection of suitable index derivatives based on the price premium.
points: Carried out the analysis to estimate the call premiums using theBlack-Scholes-Merton equation.
Built function to scrape the live data of the derivatives from BSE site drive the analysis in real time to extend it to algorithmic trading
Created API methods to produce local database in sqlite of historical re   cords of stock prices from the BSE website.

title: Prediction of the SKU-segment sales for retail branches of Big-Mart.
points: Conducted exploratory analysis of the raw data to select the parameters for the selection of features for sales prediction.
Created regression models from Tensor ow, Scikit libraries to prepare a best performing method for prediction, selected through comparative analysis.
The resultant method is to able to predict the sales around the sigma deviation of the mean sales of entire segments.

title: Image Classifier to identify 102 species of owners.
points: Built a command line API to be consumed in local application to identify the ower species in a full resolution image.
Functionality of code was to create a fully connected layer to train the local application on CNN & deliver the prediction as API output.
Pytorchâ€™s Resnet & VGG pre-trained CNN were used to build application
